plot: The story of Kenji Miyazawa, the famous Japanese poet, science-fiction writer, teacher, and amateur scientist. Like &"Shakespeare in Love,&" the movie is a rather-fictionalized account of a brief period in the authors life, culminating with the creation of his most popular work - in this case, &"A Night on the Galactic Railroad.&"   Written by  Jeremy Bristol
title: Spring and chaos
